channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2023080898
item.description:
Report X-2023080898

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-06
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080898 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TO QA LEAKING. UPON CLOSER IN SPECTION FOUND THAT THE PLASTIC BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. PACKAGE APPEARED TO HAVE BEEN LOADED AT PREVOUS LOCATION UPSIDE DOWN. ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS AND NOT SAFTY SEALS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA 2. X-2023080900 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TO QA WET. UPON CLOSER INSPECTION FOUND THAT THE PLASTIC BOTTLE HAD LOOSE CAP CAUSING THEM TO LEAK INTO THE BOX. ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX CONTAINED NO INNER PACKING. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CPAS AND NO SAFTEY SEALS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA

ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA

item.title: Report E-2023080825
item.description:
Report E-2023080825

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-05T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On August 10, 2023, two (2) 5-pound bags of sodium carbonate peroxyhydrate were torn during transit and released approximately one (1) pound of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental (GME) to remediate the impacted site. GME personnel utilized hand tools to collect and containerize all impacted material into one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2023080382
item.description:
Report X-2023080382

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTFIED BY IRREG TRAIN DRIVER THAT A DECLARED HAZAMAT LOADED ON THE TRAIN HAD A STAIN ON IT. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN FROM THE TRAIN TO THE PSC. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE STAIN WAS CAUSED BY THE CONTENTS INSIDE THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER PROCESSED LEAKING HAZMAT THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report E-2023080838
item.description:
Report E-2023080838

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-07T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that one case of weld on (un1133) had been damaged in transit by the load shifting and that 3 of the inner metal one gallon can had released 6 ounces of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found during unload with powder spilling out of box. item placed in Red Tote and loose powder cleaned up. DescribePack: Lid on container partially open on one side causing powder to spill out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: item placed upright in tote and lid secured.,

item.title: Report X-2023080469
item.description:
Report X-2023080469

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-06T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-15
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKER DISCOVERE AND EMPLOYEE CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED AFFECTED PACKAGE OPENED ON THE FLOOR. THERE WERE 2 RED CYLINDER FIRE EXTINGUISHERS INSIDE. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE WAS NOT MARKED AS A HAZMAT. RESPONDER CLEANED AND BROUGHT THE PACKAGE BACK TO BE PROCESSED. RESPONDER TALKED TO THE HAZMAT AUDITOR AND CONTACTED ADG COMPLIANCE.
